ProjectDescription: Help protect the planet while having a good time!  Why not make your next party plastic free?
Do you know what you are throwing away? And where is this place "away"? Take a closer look and see if you can make greener choices
Growing your own food is even more satisfying when you recognise the plastic packaging avoided
"Small acts add up".  Every piece of plastic you remove from a beach is one more prevented from entering our oceans
Make a personal pact to reduce your use of plastics—challenge your friends and family to do the same.
